article.title: General Atomics Supports French MQ-9 Reaper
article.text: General Atomics, Aeronautical Systems Inc., Poway, California, has been awarded a $19,070,219 option on delivery order 0113 of the basic ordering agreement FA8620-10-G-3038 for MQ-9 contractor logistics support (CLS) Phase 3. The cContractor will provide an additional period of CLS for the French air force. Work will be performed in Poway and Niamey, Niger, and is expected to be completed by December 31, 2016. This contract is 100 percent foreign military sales for France. Medium Altitude Unmanned Aircraft Systems, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity (FA8620-10-G-3038).
